desc: If you are struggling to find: Then its time to join the NBWN, ? ICAEW, BBA and NatWest Business Banking for the final ? Female and BME Business Led Forum for 2015 ? on Monday 30th November 2015 at City Hall, London SE1 2AA between 6:00pm ? 8:30pm. ?If you are struggling to keep motivated or need a fresh boost why not join us for this powerful business forum, where you will hear from a stellar line up of award winning speakers and network with like-minded peers.? This event promises to help business owners shorten their learning curve; explore pressing issues and navigate the vast array of support ? in the market place.? Reserve your seat NOW. Facilitated by Sonia Brown MBE this event looks at how micro and small businesses can refocus; explore new markets and grow their businesses resources and services for 2016 and beyond.? Attendees will hear from our topical and thought provoking guest and resident speakers who will provide ? excellent insights, strategies and ideas on how to embrace ? innovative and creative ways to market, promote and expand your business. ?Keynote speakers on the night include: Supported by a dynamic panel made up of:- This event is too good to miss! If you are serious about accelerating your performance and profits in 2016 and beyond ? reserve your place NOW!
